description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; head and shoulders of a man in a garment with an open collar and two buttons; face is shaded with horizontal lines running across the forehead, the left eye area, and the right side of the face
inscription: LL below image, in pencil: 9 | LL of sheet, in pencil: Privatexemplare. | LRC of sheet, in pencil: E.159
portfolio: From Plate 5 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 22
title: Dark Face (Self-Portrait), Plate 5 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
